about.aboutUsContact: You can contact us at contact [at] quizanthropocene.fr
about.aboutUsInfo: A bunch of volunteers involved and concerned by climate issues.
about.contributeLinkDescription: allows you to propose a question or a subject that is close to your heart. You can also leave your comments and remarks there!
about.gladToTakeFeedback: We gladly welcome any constructive feedback!
about.goFurtherInfo: to gather a lot of additional information: related associations, related projects, what we read to find new questions, etc.

header.subtitle: Questions/answers to better grasp the limits of our planet üåç
header.title: Anthropocene Quiz

home.descriptionContext: Climate disruption, annihilation of life, depletion of natural resources, artificialization of natural spaces... We have entered the Anthropocene, the era of humans. Man has become the greatest force shaping the world.
home.descriptionPlayAndShare: It's up to you to play, learn and share!
home.descriptionSiteInfo: This website aims to give you a glimpse of this impact. {0} questions online, gathered in {1} thematic quizs, with explanations, illustrations and reliable links to learn further. {2} questions have already been played on our site!
home.descriptionTtile: Questions-answers about our footprint on the planet
home.item2Title: Explore and filter with the categories & tags
home.newsletter: A newsletter to keep you up-to-date with news
home.newsletterInfo: We will just send you a few e-mails per year, with news about added quizs, pertnerships, etc.
